nodes.text: The exotic shuura fruit was yellow and cream colored, with a juicy, sweet taste. The fruit was a favorite of Padmé Amidala. While at Varykino she shared one with Anakin Skywalker.
Shuura fruit flavour syrup was used as a flavouring for Fizzyglug in Dex's Diner on the planet Coruscant.
Other fruits appearing in the scene include a pineapple, an orange, and a starfruit.
